content: I'm thinking about doing an overview / tutorial of the docker + kubernetes based stack that supports the automated ig builder, svn to git sync, and static hosting of build.fhir.org -- and maybe an overview of kubernetes in the process. If that's interesting to you, please let me know and I'll think about scheduling this either as a webinar or at an in-person hl7 meeting.
Having this as a webinar would be very helpful.
